Title: Description
Enabling Virtual Grasping using VR and F: Experimental data from a study investigating virtual grasping using VR and force feedback gloves. The study examined participants' performance in grasping tasks with different mass conditions and force feedback settings.

Title: Keywords
Enabling Virtual Grasping using VR and F: virtual reality, haptic devices, force feedback, virtual grasping

Title: EXPERIENCE.csv
Enabling Virtual Grasping using VR and F: Participants' experience data including task completion ratings and feedback

Title: PARTICIPANT_TRIALS.csv
Enabling Virtual Grasping using VR and F: Raw trial data for all participants, including mass conditions (100g-400g), attempt durations, task completion times, and error counts for each trial
